marklogic.body: For me a C-section was super easy. I was up and walking around that same night with no problems at all. My pain level was very low (and I am a HUGE wimp with pain) and my Comfort level was pretty good. Sure, it was uncomfortable at times (like when I had to Cough or Sneeze) but I thought it was a breeze. My sister also had a very easy recovery from both of her C-sections. I can say that from talking with those who had vaginal births, that they had tons of pain and cramping... where I didn't. I would do it again in a heart beat.
